title: What's On The Other Side?üòáüëø | A Conversation With June Lundgren
description:
June Lundgren is a a psychic, medium, demon seer, healer, animal communicator, and author. She was brought up by her grandmother on her mother's side, and from a young age she learned to talk to the dead. For over forty years, she has been assisting others in dealing with paranormal issues. The topics of today's episode of The Grave Talks include telepathic animal interaction, demonic possession, past life recall, and life beyond death.

PART 2 - AVAILABLE TO GRAVE KEEPERS ONLY - LISTEN HERE In part two of our interview, available only to Grave Keepers, we discuss:

Can a human soul become a demon once they die?

What is the life cycle between live on earth, being on the other side, and coming back to earth?

Can a soul return to earth at any place in time?

How did Tony Brueski die in a past life according to June?

Are black masses or ‚Äúshadow people‚Äù demons?

What happened when June died, before she was revived?
